fml.modloading.javafml.dangling_entrypoi:
File {5} contains mod entrypoint class §6{4}§r for mod with id §e{3}§r, which does not exist or is not in the same file.
Did you forget to update the mod id in the entrypoint?
fml.modloading.incompatiblemod:
模組 §e{4}§r 與 §3{3}§r §o{5,vr}§r §c不相容§r
§7目前 §3{3}§r§7 是 §o{6}§r
§7原因：§r§o{7,i18ntranslate}§r
fml.modloading.discouragedmod:
模組 §e{3}§r §d不推薦§r使用 §3{2}§r §o{4,vr}§r
§7因為 §3{2}§r§7 是 §o{5}§r
§7原因：§r§o{6,i18ntranslate}§r

fml.dependencyloading.conflictingdepende: 有些模組要求的版本與下列模組沖突：§6{3}§r。由 §e{4}§r請求。
